meanings.definition: A class of oral hypoglycemic agents used to treat type 2 diabetes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a sulfonylurea to help lower my blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent2: Many patients with type 2 diabetes benefit from taking sulfonylurea medications.
meanings.sent3: I told my friend that taking sulfonylurea is like having a secret weapon against high blood sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of sulfonylurea was like a shield protecting her from the spikes in blood sugar.
meanings.sent5: The sulfonylurea pill worked like a magic spell to control his diabetes.

meanings.definition: Any of various derivatives of sulfonamide used in the treatment of diabetes.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained the benefits of using sulfonylurea for diabetes management.
meanings.sent2: There are different types of sulfonylurea drugs available for diabetes treatment.
meanings.sent3: She joked that taking sulfonylurea was like adding a secret ingredient to her diabetes care routine.
